h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: However you get across, you can find an entrance into the cell tunnel leading to where the archer was stationed, and encounter a Red-Haired Yaksha guarding a green Wisp to absorb, which is helpful for getting back some of your healing gourd after the fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 3)'.
The content is as follows:
However you get across, you can find an entrance into the cell tunnel leading to where the archer was stationed, and encounter a Red-Haired Yaksha guarding a green Wisp to absorb, which is helpful for getting back some of your healing gourd after the fight.
